activity1.name: Take a walk
activity1.description: Take a walk! Find a park to walk through. If you don't have a park nearby, walk around your neighborhood.

activity2.name: Do a mini de-clutter
activity2.description: Remove three things you no longer wear from your wardrobe to donate.

activity3.name: Visit a museum
activity3.description: Take in an exhibit at a museum

activity4.name: At home mini-spa
activity4.description: Take a long bubble bath, give yourself a mani/pedi!

activity5.name: Shake it out!
activity5.description: Put on your favorite music and dance around your room!

activity6.name: Naptime!
activity6.description: Take a quick nap. You'll wake up feeling refreshed.

activity7.name: Meditate
activity7.description: Take a moment(or more) to simply focus on breathing and being still.

activity8.name: Cloud-watch
activity8.description: Go outside, lie on your back, and watch the clouds.

activity10.name: Watch a movie
activity10.description: Catch a movie in theaters, or curl up with Netflix

activity11.name: Hiking
activity11.description: Go for a short(or long) hike!

activity14.name: Tea
activity14.description: Make a hot cup of tea.

activity15.name: Journal
activity15.description: Take 15 minutes to write in a journal.
